name: Star Flaws
description:
Star Flaws is a humorous text adventure very loosely based on Star Wars

In this tale Nuke Skyporker, Yans Polo and Tobacco the Cookie set out to destroy the Deaf Star and rescue the princess.
When the game starts it gives the player the option of skipping the screen that outlines the story and to get straight into the game. The tale begins with Luke on the Deaf Star hiding among crates and looking for a way out.

This game was developed using Professional Adventure Writer. It supports the standard shortcuts such as N/S/E/W for North/South/East/West as well X for EXAMINE. It is also possible to give instructions to other characters such as 'SAY TO YAN "GO THERE"'

A successful solution scores 100%

shot.caption: There's a Star Flaws load screen after which this title screen appears

After two screens which say
1991 delbert The Hamster Software Presents
 A P.A.W.S. productioncomes the inevitable
The first game screen is the blue text. An attempt to get information on the game's vocabulary then produced the first joke
After a short foray into the game the player exits
